step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep focusing on gently squeezing your shoulder blades back and down.
Excellent! You're performing the circular motion smoothly. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.
Fantastic! You've completed all repetitions. Continue to focus on the deep breaths as you roll your shoulders back.

exercise_summary: You've done a wonderful job with your shoulder rolls! Keep up the great work by continuing to sit or stand comfortably and performing the circular motion. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
